title: North East Line - Early Closure Due to Maintenance Works

updates.text: Due to maintenance works, train svcs on the NEL between NE1 HarbourFront & NE6 Dhoby Ghaut will be affected by early closure at ard 11pm tonight - 30 Mar. Pls note: Shuttle Bus 22 will be in operation to serve the affected stns while Svcs 315 & 325 will run until 1am.
